entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
